item.title: Qidan
item.description: About Class - Spore Druid From - Ofheise Backstory: Part of a drudic clan which resided in the forests northwest of Ofheise was cast out for being lazy and focused on the darker parts of druidic craft focusing on spores and decay instead of life and rejuvenation.
